'''Nathan 'Tahg' Gilbert''' is a programmer who previously worked on the official [[Mods#Official Modding API|Modding API]] for [[Mojang]]. He was one of the four main developers of [[mcservers:Bukkit|Bukkit]]. He was hired on February 28, 2012.<ref>http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/bukkit-the-next-chapter.62489/ https://web.archive.org/web/20120302070401/http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/bukkit-the-next-chapter.62489/</ref> On July 31, 2012, Gilbert announced over Twitter that he would no longer be working on ''Minecraft''.<ref>{{tweet|Tahgtahv|230343513143918592|I am no longer working on Minecraft. Anyone looking for a Java software developer? Send me a reply and we can get in touch|July 31, 2012}}</ref> On August 1, 2012, Gilbert released his official statement on regards to his departure from Mojang.<ref>http://pastebin.com/GCjUBUUA</ref>

Much like [[Dinnerbone]], Nathan is [[w:red-green color blindness|red-green color blind]].{{citation needed}}

He is also a member of the Forgecraft server.
